title: Life to the full in a vibrant central location
text: It’s time to start living life to its fullest, enjoying the pleasures that Liverpool ‘the city of culture’ has to offer. Make the most of world class retail therapy with the designer boutiques and high street heaven of Liverpool One Shopping Centre right on your doorstep. And once you’re ready to drop, sink into a couch at one of the many local bars, or grab a bite before a short stroll home along the waterfront.
label: Make an enquiry
